type.description: The type of the message, should be 'init'.

num_channels.description: The number of audio channels for the audio stream.

samplerate.description: The sample rate of the audio stream.

blocksize.description: The block size of audio data sent in each WebSocket message.

language.description: The language used for the detection, should be 'fr' (French) or 'en' (English).

features.description: The list of features to enable, should include 'wakeword-detector' and/or 'sound-detector'. Default value is ['wakeword-detector', 'sound-detector'].

description: JSON Schema for the message structure used during the initialization process.
